text: Rovereto (; "wood of sessile oaks") is a city and comune in Trentino in northern Italy. It is located in the Vallagarina valley of the Adige River. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website * *Mart Museum of Modern and Contemporary Art of Trento and Rovereto *Blog OcchioDiRovereto *Massa Critica Rovereto *Italian War Museum in Rovereto *ViaggiaRovereto(Android Application) â€“ Implemented as part of SmartCampus project , the research project founded by TrentoRise , UNITN, and FBK Category:Cities in Trentino
title: Rovereto
